poem:
**On Choosing Leaders**

The board convenes,  
a stuttering flame against  
the wind of change;  
their voices grip the past,  
smothering in old hands  
the vibrant pulse  
of what must come.  
Diversity shifts like sand,  
yet hearts remain steadfast,  
trapped between  
the lines of fear  
and what they dare  
not name as wisdom.
